document_data.name: Conjuring of the Second Moon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Conjuring of the Second Moon''' was a sacred ritual performed by followers of [[Selûne]], the Night White Lady.
document_data.History: The Conjuring of the Second Moon was observed by Selûnites on [[Shieldmeet]]. [[Shards]] were summoned to serve the Selûnites, which usually involved doing battle with minions of vile [[Shar]]. In return for their service, the Shards took one of the female Selûnites to become one of them when they departed.
